thread.title: CBP Officers seize a shipment of hashish at Joussieh crossing between Syria and Lebanon
thread.title_full: CBP Officers seize a shipment of hashish at Joussieh crossing between Syria and Lebanon

author: muohammad
title: CBP Officers seize a shipment of hashish at Joussieh crossing between Syria and Lebanon
text:
Damascus-SANA
Customs and Border Protection officers (CBP) at Joussieh border crossing in Homs countryside seized on Thursday a shipment of narcotic hashish in the possession of a traveler arriving from Lebanon.
The General Authority of Land and Sea Ports in Syria stated that the quantity was confiscated, a formal seizure was carried out, and the case was referred to the Anti-Narcotics Department for further investigation and the necessary legal action against the smuggler.
The Authority also confirmed that its customs and security personnel are making great efforts around the clock to combat smuggling operations, particularly the smuggling of narcotics targeting Syrian society.
The competent authorities are making every effort to ensure the protection of the borders and security preservation of the homeland and its citizens.
Last January, the administration of Nassib border crossing with Jordan seized a large shipment of more than 7 million narcotic pills hidden inside a shipment intended for export abroad.
Adnan/Fedaa
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->drug related crimes
